member.name: SP_DEVINFO_DATA
member.summary: An SP_DEVINFO_DATA structure defines a device instance that is a member of a device information set.

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_DEVINFO_DATA structure. For more information, see the following Remarks section.

member.name: SP_DEVINFO_DATA.ClassGuid
member.summary: The GUID of the device's setup class.

summary.para: An opaque handle to the device instance (also known as a handle to the devnode).

Some functions, such as SetupDiXxx functions, take the whole SP_DEVINFO_DATA structure as input to identify a device in a device information set. Other functions, such as CM_Xxx functions like , take this DevInst handle as input.
